name: Mental Model Mastery
description: Naval, Bezos, Munger, Buffet & Musk are among the world's leading minds, they use mental models daily to solve problems, master human psychology, and make better decisions.I've created a Notion doc breaking down 30+ mental models that’ll help you do the same.Mental models discussed include: First principles Second-Order ThinkingLaw of the Instrument/Maslow’s hammerLeverageRegret Minimization FrameworkGame theoryCircle of CompetenceVia NegativaThe A-B-Z FrameworkThe Snowball/compound Effect++
features: First principles; Second-Order Thinking; Law of the Instrument/Maslow’s hammer; Regret Minimization Framework; Game theory; Circle of Competence; Via Negativa; The A-B-Z Framework; The Snowball/compound Effect
